original_title: UFC Fight Night 173: Brunson vs. Shahbazyan
overview: UFC Fight Night 173: Brunson vs. Shahbazyan was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that took place on August 1, 2020 at the UFC Apex facility in Enterprise, Nevada, part of the Las Vegas Metropolitan Area, United States.
title: UFC Fight Night 173: Brunson vs. Shahbazyan
